name: enigma-uikit
description: Intuitive, accessible solutions for common UI needs in React.

scripts.docs: mkdir -p docs/sdk && find . -type f -name '*.js' -not \( -path './node_modules/*' -or -path './docs/*' -or -path './dist/*' -or -path './*/demo/*' \) -not -name 'unit.*' -mindepth 2 | xargs jsdoc -d docs/sdk -c docs/jsdoc.json README.md --verbose
scripts.site_js: budo site/index.js:dist/bundle.js -d site -H localhost --colors --live --open --pushstate --iw -- -t babelify -t brfs
scripts.site: sh parallelize.sh "npm run site_css" "npm run site_js"
scripts.build: browserify $(npm run -s browserify_config) $(npm run -s exclude_peer_deps) -o dist/uikit.js --debug
scripts.build_release: NODE_ENV=production browserify $(npm run -s browserify_config) $(npm run -s exclude_peer_deps) | uglifyjs -mc drop_console > dist/uikit.min.js
scripts.build_standalone: NODE_ENV=production browserify $(npm run -s browserify_config) -t [ exposify --expose [ --react React --react-dom ReactDOM ] ] $(npm run -s exclude_peer_deps) --debug -o dist/uikit-standalone.js
scripts.build_standalone_release: NODE_ENV=production browserify $(npm run -s browserify_config) -t [ exposify --expose [ --react React --react-dom ReactDOM ] ] $(npm run -s exclude_peer_deps) | uglifyjs -mc drop_console > dist/uikit-standalone.min.js
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run build_release && npm run build_standalone && npm run build_standalone_release
